algorithm_technique: Flatten grid, check divisibility by x, find median, calculate operations.
problem_summary_simple: Make all grid elements equal by adding/subtracting x, find minimum operations.
problem_summary_technical: Check if all elements have the same remainder modulo x. If so, find the median of flattened grid and sum absolute differences divided by x.
key_insights: The target value must be achievable from all elements by adding/subtracting x. This implies all elements must have the same remainder when divided by x.
The optimal target value to minimize operations is the median of all elements.
The `nth_element` (or quickselect) algorithm is used to efficiently find the median in O(N) average time.
